abstract: Lucid Imagination, an open-source start-up, hopes to rival the likes of Microsoft and Google in the market for corporate search technology.
snippet: Lucid Imagination, an open-source start-up, hopes to rival the likes of Microsoft and Google in the market for corporate search technology.
lead_paragraph: Lucid Imagination is the latest beneficiary of what I like to call the boil-in-a-bag open-source business model.

headline.main: Seeking Profit in Open-Source Search Software
